## DataAdapter.read() method

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

| Parameter                   | Type                | Description                                                                    |
| --------------------------- | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| <code>normalizedPath</code> | <code>string</code> | path to file, use [normalizePath()](../normalizePath) to normalize beforehand. |
